data.message: Hellow facebook pls reply my question because someone message about costing money of facebook from mark the director of facebook  and said that facebook is closing tommorow at 6 PM and if i open my facebook you have to pay based on the law is this true ?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Giane. It sounds like you received a spam message. Facebook is free and it always will be! Learn more: http://bit.ly/2vASEYg. -Elizabeth

Facebook I have problem and its very serious for me my Facebook account has disabled and I created another one but please help me how can I be able for my first  account there is very  important stuff  please  help me out
